SEARCH

Package gutek.services

package gutek.services
This package contains all service classes used in the application, including:
  • User management services for the application.
  • Card management services.
  • Services for managing card revision registration.
  • Deck management services.
  • Deck statistics services.
  • Repetition algorithm management services.
  • Chart management services.
  • Translation services.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gutek
    Main package of the application.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppUserService
    Service class for managing users and authentication operations.
    CardRevisionService
    Service class responsible for handling the revision of cards.
    CardService
    Service class for managing CardBase entities and related operations.
    ChartService
    Service class responsible for managing chart generation and translation of available ranges and chart types.
    DeckService
    Service class responsible for managing decks and cards.
    DeckStatisticsService
    Service class responsible for managing deck statistics.
    RevisionAlgorithmService
    Service responsible for managing revision algorithms, including loading them dynamically from the classpath and creating instances.
    TranslationService
    Service responsible for handling translations and managing locale settings.
